title: Strangely high latency(ping)
body: I'm from India and I've been playing on OCE since last christmas when a friend of mine from Australia told me to. Since then.I'd have a ping of 200-350 usually,which is playable. But recently,my ping is about 660-700,which is kinda weird cause I tested my ping and internet speed on speedtest.net and everything's normal. Youtube videos are smooth and all. Its just league of legends.I tried port forwarding, changing my dns, etc. Can someone help me out please?

replies.body:
Hi,

Sucks to hear you are having issues :(  My guess is that If playing from India, you are probably impacted by a cable cut between Singapore & Perth, which should be resolved some time in the coming weeks.

[More info here](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/M0OF0eg3-latency-issues?comment=0000000000010000)

Mindstar
guess it got fixed m8.its back to normal now wooo!
